conversations.body_text: Hi Thomas Stowers,  Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We will arrange shipment within the next two days and sincerely apologize for the delay. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224807235
there were several items. What was out of stock? Thanks, Thomas Stowers 706-372-6931
Hi Thomas Stowers,     The Pro X pedals are currently out of stock at our US warehouse. We are urgently air-shipping a batch of goods and expect to ship your order on the 21st.
